channel.title: .directory folder and hedden files
channel.description:
1) Why I have everywhere a hidden folder **.directory** and how to disable (remove) it?
2) How to see all hidden files ".file" always in Dolphin?

item.title: .directory folder and hedden files
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Darian:
  1. Why I have everywhere a hidden folder .directory and how to disable (remove) it?

That is an automatically created folder used by to store settings applied to the folder it is in. You may stop this from happening by going into Settings -> Behaviour -> Use same settings for all folders. You’ll lose folder specific settings though.

Darian:
  1. How to see all hidden files “.file” always in Dolphin?

Just press “Alt” and “+” simultaniously.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
